ygData.subject: Level 33
ygData.msgSnippet: Looks like I will spend the whole of level 33 sitting in a cave in Warsliks Woods, hunting brutes. Need the hides for my tailoring. Halfling tailor, Vale
ygData.messageBody:
Looks like I will spend the whole of level 33 sitting in a cave in
Warsliks Woods, hunting brutes. Need the hides for my tailoring.
Halfling tailor, Vale Armor. The exp is not great, but since I need
the hides anyway, it is working well.

It is unfortunate that the Halfling cultural armor does not offer
that much in stats. I have replaced all of my armor which has not
been superior to the Vale armor, except next trip to Rivervale I need
to make leggings.

I may try to sell some pieces in the Bazzaar, but don't think the
market is very good for that. Probably will make a few pieces to give
to young Halfling druids, then find my way to Velious to begin
aquiring pieces of fur for the Underhill bags.

I think there will be a market for those.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Druid
